tech.sectionTitle: Technology that holds. Values that last.

teaser.feature2: Alternative mounting without metallic surface ‚Äì adheres to smooth surfaces.

tech.feature1Text: High-quality neodymium magnets ensure secure hold on all metallic surfaces.
tech.feature2Text: Alternative mounting without metallic surface. Our nano-gel coasters adhere reliably to smooth surfaces like glass, wood, or plastic ‚Äì ideal wherever magnets cannot be used.
tech.feature3Text: Tested on boats, in vehicles, and under extreme conditions.
tech.feature4Text: From 0¬∞C to +50¬∞C ‚Äì ready for any situation.
tech.sustainability1Text: Our holders are largely made from recycled plastics.
tech.sustainability2Text: We offset all CO‚ÇÇ emissions in production and shipping.
tech.sustainability3Text: Designed for years of use ‚Äì against throwaway culture.
tech.sustainability4Text: Individual parts can be reordered and replaced.
tech.image1Alt: UNBREAK ONE wine glass holder with wine glass on ship
tech.image2Alt: UNBREAK ONE bottle holder with bottle on ship

howTo.sectionSubtitle: UNBREAK ONE is easy to install and use ‚Äì no screws, no drilling.
howTo.step1Text: Magnetically on metal surfaces or with nano-gel on smooth surfaces ‚Äì simply attach with nano-gel coasters.
howTo.step1ImageAlt: UNBREAK ONE installation step 1 - Place holder
howTo.step2Text: Place glass or bottle in the holder. The holder automatically adapts.
howTo.step2ImageAlt: UNBREAK ONE installation step 2 - Insert glass or bottle
howTo.step3Text: Stable & secure ‚Äì whether on water, in camper, or at home.
howTo.step3ImageAlt: UNBREAK ONE installation step 3 - Enjoy and relax

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section1Intro: The controller responsible for data processing on this website is:
privacy.section2Intro: This website is technically operated by:
privacy.section2Contract: Where required, a data processing agreement pursuant to Art. 28 GDPR is in place with the hosting provider.
privacy.section3Intro: When you access the website for informational purposes, the server automatically processes the following data (server log files):
privacy.section3Item5: Date and time of the server request
privacy.section3Purpose: ensuring technical stability and security, error analysis, defense against attacks.
privacy.section4Text: If you contact us via email, phone, or a contact form, we process your information (e.g., name, email address, message content) solely to handle your request.
privacy.section4Storage: as long as necessary to process the request and, where applicable, in accordance with statutory retention requirements.
privacy.section5Text:
This website uses strictly necessary cookies/local storage to provide core functionality (e.g., language preference, cart/session functions).
No tracking or marketing cookies are used unless explicitly added with proper transparency.
privacy.section5Legal2: Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR (legitimate interest) or Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR (cart/order)
privacy.section6Title: 6. Online shop, orders and contract performance
privacy.section6Intro: When you place an order on unbreak-one.com, we process:
privacy.section6Data1: Identity data: name, billing and shipping address
privacy.section6Data2: Contact data: email address, optionally phone number
privacy.section6Data3: Order data: items, quantity, price, shipping details
privacy.section6Purpose: contract performance, delivery, invoicing, customer support.
privacy.section6Storage: as required for contract handling and statutory retention periods (e.g., tax and commercial law).
privacy.section7Intro: We use Stripe (Stripe Payments Europe, Ltd. and affiliated entities) to process payments. Via Stripe, payments by credit/debit card and‚Äîdepending on the checkout configuration‚ÄîPayPal may be available.
privacy.section7DataIntro: Depending on the selected payment method, the following data may be processed:
privacy.section7Data1: Payment data (e.g., card type, cardholder, verification data; card/account data is typically processed directly by Stripe)
privacy.section7Data4: Contact data (e.g., email) and, where necessary, billing/shipping data for reconciliation
privacy.section7Purpose: payment processing, fraud prevention, risk checks, refunds.
privacy.section7Transfer: depending on provider structure and payment method, data may be transferred to third countries (e.g., the U.S.). Where applicable, transfers are carried out based on appropriate safeguards (e.g., EU Standard Contractual Clauses) and/or other lawful mechanisms.
privacy.section7More: More information is provided in the privacy notices of Stripe/PayPal during checkout.
privacy.section7aText: This website uses only locally hosted fonts. No personal data is transmitted to external font providers (e.g., Google Fonts). All font files are delivered directly from our server.
privacy.section8Text: When you visit our social media pages, processing is governed by the privacy policies of the respective providers. We have limited influence over this processing.
privacy.section9Intro: Subject to legal requirements, you have the following rights:
privacy.section10Authority: Independent State Centre for Data Protection Schleswig-Holstein (ULD)
privacy.section11Text: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data against loss, manipulation, or unauthorized access.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.subtitle: of Rick's Gastro & Event GmbH
terms.section1Text:
Your order will be processed, assembled, and shipped within 3‚Äì5 days after receipt of payment. The delivery time after shipping depends on the selected shipping method and the respective delivery location.

Shipping Area: We deliver worldwide.
terms.section2Text: Payment is made in advance. After order confirmation, you will receive our bank details. The goods will be shipped after receipt of payment.
terms.section3Text: Consumers have the right to withdraw from this contract within 14 days without giving reasons. The withdrawal period is 14 days from the day you took possession of the goods. To exercise your right of withdrawal, you must inform us (Ricks Gastro & Event GmbH, Grasweg 48, 24118 Kiel, Email: widerruf@unbreak-one.de) by means of a clear statement of your decision to withdraw from this contract. Withdrawal is excluded for individually customized products (e.g., with personalized designs).
terms.section4Text: For commercial customers (B2B), the warranty period is 6 months from receipt of goods. For consumers (B2C), the statutory warranty rights of 2 years from receipt of goods apply.
terms.section5Text: Responsible for data processing: Ricks Gastro & Event GmbH, Grasweg 48, 24118 Kiel, Email: info@unbreak-one.de. Your personal data will only be used for order processing and customer support and will not be passed on to third parties. Legal basis is Art. 6 para. 1 lit. b GDPR (contract fulfillment). You have the right to access, rectification, deletion, and restriction of processing of your data as well as a right to object. Your data will be stored for the duration of the business relationship and in accordance with statutory retention periods.
terms.section6Text: German law applies. Place of jurisdiction ‚Äì insofar as legally permissible ‚Äì is Kiel.
